N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 21.5 - Sick leave at half-pay

State Regulations

The appointing authority may, in its discretion, grant sick
leave at half-pay for personal illness to a permanent employee having not less
than one year of service after all of his sick leave, vacation and overtime
credits have been used; provided, however, that the cumulative total of all
sick leave at half-pay hereafter granted to any employee during his State
service shall not exceed one pay period for each completed six months of his

State service. Notes
